details.sectionContent: Take Risk with all Your Heart, Sharpen Your Mind with Adventurous Heart;Use Your Strength but don't be Harsh, Risky Legs and Play it Hard.
The master of all detective games is here to test you to the extreme. A challenge that will leave you wanting for more.

Participants will get clues which will lead them to different places, after reaching those places they need to observe some pictorial representation memorize it and answer questionnaires based on that. Quiz performing on “Kahoot”. Also, there will be questions aptitude based.

Qualified teams will now have to solve riddles which will indicate some location! This chain will continue, and teams will be eliminated on who wins the fewer tasks. Also, after this, they will have to complete specific tasks to make it to the final round.
Finally what you came here for - The Murder Mystery. Solve it, youwin.
